title: I Play At Garena's LoL And Can I sign for PBE??

replies.body: Since the Garena servers run on a separate platform, you probably won't be able to use your Garena account to apply for PBE. I'm not 100% sure whether or not the Garena servers have a PBE region or not, but it'd be worth reaching out to them in a ticket to see what your options are.
